attributes.action: Borrow from Our Pensioners at a Fair Rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Interest rates on investments have dwindled to almost nothing and as every “prudent” person in the UK knows, savers are the hardest hit, particularly pensioners.

With the Government needing to borrow billions of pounds, wouldn’t it be better to borrow from our pensioners and savers.

Give them a fair guaranteed rate of interest and in return they will spend the money in the UK on UK goods and services.

At present bonds are issued to anyone around the world and we end up paying vast sums in interest that leave our shores and does nothing to help our economy.

By paying a good rate of return to our pensioners (and why not all UK savers) the money will stay in OUR economy and help us through this current crisis.

It seems simple, but it would be very effective and reward all those careful people who did not mortgage their life away on frivolous; spurious and unnecessary luxuries.
